website_summaries.verdict: An affordable set of bookshelf speakers that still produce good sound quality.
pros: Good quality sound for the size
1" soft dome tweeter provides clean, powerful highs
5.5" woofer works well for music, TV shows, movies, and video games
Speakers are able to be wall mounted
cons: The wall mounting template doesn't always match the actual measurements of the speakers
Buyers recommend pairing with a sub for better bass quality

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers, way bad mounting template
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these in my garage/shop and they sound really nice. Not too bright, decent bass reproduction for their size. No obvious weaknesses. That said, DO NOT use the mounting template that came with it; at a minimum, check the dimensions on it to make sure they correspond with what they are supposed to be. I had a number of failed mounting attempts before I compared the template to the speakers themselves. Surprise, surprise. The template was way different than the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: eddywouldgo

customer_reviews.title: I don't think you will find better speakers. The soft dome tweeter is natural sounding
customer_reviews.text: The crossover is listed at 18db per octave at 2,500 Hz and is sonically seamless. For the price, I don't think you will find better speakers. The soft dome tweeter is natural sounding, unlike all the metal domes I have ever heard. The enclosure is acoustic suspension, which means tight sound and no port noise. I have not listened to these speakers with high end equipment, so I really do not know its full potential.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Calder

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality. We have these speakers placed up high on entertainment shelving on either side of the television about 8" from the ceiling 7 feet apart directly against the wall. The mid base is impressive for any speaker. the highs are crisp, but not screaming. Very balanced speakers. Piano come out clear like you have a grand piano in the room.
customer_reviews.author: LadyT

customer_reviews.title: Clean and warm bookshelf speakers with great sound
customer_reviews.text: I am not an audiophile but do play guitar and definitely understand sound quality. Compared to other Klipsch and Polk Audio bookshelf speakers I own, these are warm and pleasing to listen to. They are perfect where high quality speakers are desired in a small package and the price is right for me. I have used these in a 2 stall garage, living room and bedroom. They sound great wherever I have placed them. I would definitely buy them again in the future. My only complaint is the appearance of the angled top on the speakers, but that's just my personal opinion, that doesn't affect the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: For what I’m using them for, they’re awesome
customer_reviews.text: I likely wouldn’t put these in as part of my surround, but I replaced some crackling old Fisher “bookshelf” speakers on a circa 1980 Pioneer rack system. These are about 1/3 the size and can push out full volume. At least until the neighbors complain. I’d hooked up an aux cable, so I have a teenager cranking music out of it. He enjoys it. I’m happy. I gave it a 4 only because the sound quality isn’t quite on par with some of the older jbl’s I have. It’s not as rich of a sound.
customer_reviews.author: Skredberry

customer_reviews.title: Jbl makes good speakers
customer_reviews.text: I picked these when upgrading my home theater last year from jbl sound bar to full 7.1. Got 2 pair to use for rear surround and front high atmos speakers. Sound very clean and clear. When it comes to home theater there is no cap . You can always get better if willing to spend. While these are not top of the line, they are in their price point. The sound great and jbl's last. With a matching set of jbl arena speakers you can put together a really good home theater without spending a unnecessary fortune
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Good for what they are
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound from modest sized speakers. I did not expect audiophile quality, and I am using them with a DVD player for moves and music, but they are more than adequate. I would recommend them for that type of use, but not as primary speakers in a good audio system.
customer_reviews.author: Stereophile 1955

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I use these speakers for my surround sound on my home theater. They were bigger than I thought they would be...and heavy. Installing on the wall wasn't very easy as heavy as they were, but it did work eventually. The sound is amazing! I'm very happy with the sound quality! They have a rich, full sound for a smaller speaker. My surround sound is also connected to my turntable and receiver, so I use it to listen to music as well...and it does a great job of filling the room!
customer_reviews.author: alankhorst

customer_reviews.title: So clear and loud!  Buy these speakers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine are fronts for my 5.1 surround system (Yamaha RX-V481, Cerwin Vega center VE-5C, JBL ES250P subwoofer). My music has never sounded more clear, more detailed and louder! The sheer power of the JOB Arena B15 is accuracy, detailed reproduction and volume! I bought my equipment over time as I'm not wealthy. However with these B15's, I'd put my system up against anyone else's. BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.author: NYCJF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are great. The pack huge sound, in a small package. I wall mounted them, and they work excellent. The short depth makes them look nice. They also look awesome without the grill on.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great highs.
customer_reviews.text: I use these as surround and home-made fwd Atmos speakers. They need to be tuned into the system as they have very little bottom/low end. I’ve got them cut at 90hz and i am pleased. It took effort to modify them for my applications but the money saved was worth it. They reproduce fill sound excellently. It’s easier to just spend the $500-$700 on proper speakers rather than do all the work needed to mod these for atmos use but i had the time and inclination and really wanted to drop cash on other wants instead. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Just Nick

customer_reviews.title: Create form factor, terrible sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more from JBL on this product, but the lack of clarity and non-existent bass-response is very disappointing. Ended up going with Klipsch speakers,
customer_reviews.author: EvanJ

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Sealed Speakers - A Real Rarity
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding sealed, two-way speakers. They do lack a deep bottom-end, but I feel that their bass response begins to roll off at around 100Hz. That means that there is a fair amount of bass. I recommend one or two small subs. These are an outstanding deal for two-channel music. Dispersion is excellent. The sound is big, even for early Sabbath or Glenn Gold.
customer_reviews.author: Romaine Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 6 weeks, warranty service is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Six weeks after purchasing one of the speaker has started to pop and hiss and become unusable. Contacted JBL and 7 days later best I got from their department is (we will get back to you). My other JBL speakers appear to be working just fine, but these I would avoid and be suspect of JBL's warranty service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY ON A BUDGET!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker brand has been in our family for 25 years and never have been a disappointment! Can find a bookshelf speaker for the price to work as well. We have had 3 sets, this being our 3rd. We use them I should say abuse them every chance we get! When we’re not jamming we’re watching movies! There a great pair with our Klipsch Bass.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality and value for money.
customer_reviews.text: JBL speakers are one of the top brands that I go way back with. These bookshelf speakers don't disappoint me one bit and produce the fine quality audio experience that one would expect from the JBL brand. They arrived in a timely manner and were in excellent condition. I would hesitate to recommend this product or the seller to others.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em. Sound really good
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em. Sound really good. Does need to be hooked up to a system that has a sub however, not enough low end (particularly for jazz, where you really want to hear the bass line well and full).
customer_reviews.author: JK07

customer_reviews.title: Finally got these
customer_reviews.text: Had my eyes on these for a while till i saw them reach a reasonable price! Sound quality is great the only con is the bass is a little on the weak side but to each his own. Well built and have weight to them! Perfect low profile speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding value for a pair of front height speakers for my HT>
customer_reviews.author: oldtexasdog

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound.
customer_reviews.text: I have the complete set of this the jbl line-up. In conjunction with my Shrewood receiver, it complements my ears like the perfect paradise.
customer_reviews.author: Corvette1

customer_reviews.title: Top off your subwoofer with the best
customer_reviews.text: The narrow range but articulate bass makes the B15 a perfect satellite for use with a subwoofer. Only a well designed and well built sealed box can do this. These Arenas live up to the proud JBL heritage. As an 81 year old audiophile whose golden ear ain’t what it once was I just say steal a pair at $100.
customer_reviews.author: Chronas Maganaas

customer_reviews.title: Much better than POLK
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are incredible. I purchased a set of Polk t15 bookshelf speakers and tried them for a few days before returning them for these. I was shocked at how much better the JBL's sounded. Better highs and lows WOW! Don't be confused with the Polk reviews, they must be Polk fans. Get these JBL's and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt from SD

customer_reviews.title: Great, always use JBL speakers for my home and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great, always use JBL speakers for my home and car. I have been using JBL brand for the past 40 years plus.
customer_reviews.author: ERNIE PALMEJAR

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I got these while I only had $75 and I was not expecting to get anything good. When I hooked them up they were so good that the only thing I had ever heard that sounded better was a $500 surround sound. Now that these are $200 I would still say that they are great for the price. I would recommend these to anyone just trying to get a decently loud speakers and great audio quality. The bass is just right and all of the audio is clear. All in all great speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: JBL never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: They sound great for their size. Great budget speakers with a punchy sound, offering plenty of highs and lows. I think they were worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tylor

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers to be surround speakers. I have been pleased with the sound quality. They shipped with a pattern for wall mounts which made mounting them on the wall very easy. The build quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sounding speakers
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sounding speakers. Nice deep bass, mid-range and treble is sweet. Not heavy, light weight but provides a sweet sound. Speakers were delivered a day earlier than expected. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: bookshelf sound without the bulk
customer_reviews.text: Thes speakers sound great as surround front when accompanied by a subwoofer. Crisp highs/mids. Solid build quality and a nice, shallow form factor. When you need bookshelf sound without the bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice speakers, they get super loud - base is ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice speakers, they get super loud - base is a little weak but considering the size that is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor bass but otherwise nice sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very impressed for a product with the JBL name on them. Poor bass but otherwise nice sound. Over priced, in my opinion payed for the name. Considering returning them for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Feld

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, clean, clear, lacking in bass, best used for 2.1 or surround setups, not stereo.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this not realizing this isnt really for stereo setups. These guys are crisp and really bright so adjust your treble according. But when it comes to bass these are poor and no amount of eq can fix it. Got a matching JBL sub to compensate for the lack of bass, which after running my home theatre calibration evened it out rather nicely.
customer_reviews.author: spicyramenTT

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the prince range.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice speakers for the money. I have always been a fan of JBL and these didn't disappoint. I purchased these to replace small set of Onkyo factory front speakers. Much better quality and range then the factory speakers.
customer_reviews.author: SafeT

customer_reviews.title: They sound fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I make no claims about my ability to discern nuances of speakers like some sort of biped dolphin. Having said that; these speakers sound fantastic on my secondary system with a Marantz S47K. I've used turntables, AppleTV, and a home theater PC with great results. Powerful clear sound and while more frugal than my usual tastes, I don't regret buying these for one second.
customer_reviews.author: K.L. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sound great, Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: A decent, quality item for the price. Well built and sound great, Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

customer_reviews.title: JBL Quality in a small size.
customer_reviews.text: JBL Quality in a small size. They sound great for book shelf speakers. They do exactly what I need.
customer_reviews.author: D. Herring

customer_reviews.title: These JBLs provide the perfect balance of sound
customer_reviews.text: These JBLs provide the perfect balance of sound. We bought 4 of them and have them spread throughout the living room. Can't believe how affordable they are! This is Harman's cheapest speaker and it still blows away anything else in the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: JBL needs to make these again
customer_reviews.text: Have them on a sub with a crossover. They can scream at you or tune them down for awesome sound quality. My amp is dumb. Most important part you have to have a head unit that does what you tell it. Power only.
customer_reviews.author: Roddie Hoover

customer_reviews.title: These are great speakers for the price and size
customer_reviews.text: These are great speakers for the price and size. The low end is very good considering the price/size. Don't expect these or replace 12" subs or $500 B&Os but I would definitely suggest for a family room, game room or an enclosed patio.
customer_reviews.author: NJ-WorkerDrone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is all you can ask for...clean, clear tones...easy to set up, and compact enough to fit just about anywhere...Highly recommend 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D'Addio

customer_reviews.title: JBL is still a great sounding speaker!
customer_reviews.text: As JBL is an old pioneer in sound speakers, I knew I would be getting a good deal. But I didn’t realize that these speakers really sound great and the price was even better. It was definitely a good investment for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Julian B.

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are not expensive speakers so you shouldn't expect top level performance. I hung them in my garage and I am happy with the result. Glad I chose them.
customer_reviews.author: jhimmel

customer_reviews.title: From Willie to Ozzy
customer_reviews.text: A lot of really clean sound from 2 pretty affordable speakers. Tried Willie Nelson, Black Sabbath, and Buddy Guy...all sound great.
customer_reviews.author: RiverTitan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love my JBL speakers. Been a fan a long time. Note these are the same as the Arena 120's just a special edition for Best Buy. Lower price, same speaks
customer_reviews.author: Bill J. F.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound as I expected with no loss of table ...
customer_reviews.text: On the wall no, wires showing in my large bedroom. Great sound as I expected with no loss of table or floor space.
customer_reviews.author: Control

customer_reviews.title: All in all they are good for the
customer_reviews.text: Included diagram was off and so had to readjust measurements. I expected a little more umpf out of these speakers. All in all they are good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked JBL and these speakers have more then met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert E. Horner, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Still love JBL
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for my turntable. No output available, only in. Return went awesome and easy to do. Wish there was more description about the speakers on here so I would’ve known before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Real sound for surround sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent surround speakers, they boosted my surround experience quite a bit. Excellent JBL sound.
customer_reviews.author: MRMickle

customer_reviews.title: turn it up
customer_reviews.text: Could not have picked a better set. Small and powerful. Nice
customer_reviews.author: tim wilster

customer_reviews.title: Great as rear surround sound speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great as surround sound speakers. Paired with other JBL Arena series speakers for a 5.1 setup. Will be buying another pair soon to use as Dolby Atmos front height speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bookshelf speaker with typical JBL sound at fair price for hometheater its priceless
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: The sound was fine, when they worked
customer_reviews.text: The sound was fine, when they worked. One of these speakers broke within two weeks of delivery, and the other went just two and a half months later. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L Van Singel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sounding without the extra colorful highs like other speakers!
customer_reviews.author: chukou

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound great and I would recommend these to anyone on a budget. My only complaint is the mounting template is not accurate. This did not effect the way the speakers mounted it just took some extra time.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Kurz

customer_reviews.title: sound good
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are working out good with our surround system.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona C Pajunen

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speakers for such a small size
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speakers for such a small size. Brackets will make it easier to wall mount after I figure out final positions.
customer_reviews.author: Ken G

customer_reviews.title: awsome sound
customer_reviews.text: big sound in a small package these speakers rattle the house if you want them to
customer_reviews.author: Nate ATx

customer_reviews.title: Good quality speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers but if you want bass get a sub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use a smaller screw head for hanging
customer_reviews.text: They look great and sound perfect in my application! Wall hanging instructions are erroneous. The # 10 screw and anchor are too big for the mounting holes on the speaker casing?
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Small speaker but big sound
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected and the sound they put out is awesome-would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Greg T.

customer_reviews.title: What a joke
customer_reviews.text: Laughable mounting brackets, if you don't have a uni-bit to ream out the holes good luck mounting these to a wall! Garbage
customer_reviews.author: mark moran

customer_reviews.title: good thin speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: sound good, & I like how thin they are. Perfect for wall mounting.Template is off though. Just measure it.
customer_reviews.author: joe - PA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of speakers. Using them as front left and right in a home entertainment set up
customer_reviews.author: edward c.

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are great! They have very good bass and good if ...
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are great! They have very good bass and good if you need speakers to replace your television speakers.
customer_reviews.author: ROSALIO GUTIERREZ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for office. A little bigger than I expected, but adequate sound at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: No OnenParticular

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Speakers have a dynamic range and for my limited space they are more than up to the job and priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Dean

customer_reviews.title: Although speakers are small, sounds are nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I listen music only through Vacuam amplifier through JBL. Lancer 101.
customer_reviews.author: Cancer treatment

customer_reviews.title: Clear, vibrant sound in a quality pair of Bookshelf speakers
customer_reviews.text: I paired these speakers with a stereo receiver as part of a HDTV set-up. I wanted good power and clarity. For me, these speakers sound really nice as I play Spotify music through PlayStation 4, listen to DVDs, or watch Television. I like listening to sports such as football or baseball to feel like "I'm there". I tend to listen to TV at lower volumes, but there are times I've played music loud and found everything very dynamic, full and clear. I did not detect any buzz or unwanted noise. I did not want to spend any more than this and feel like they are a great value. The workmanship and construction seem like they are built to last.
customer_reviews.author: 1mic

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Quality of sound is excellent. East to install. We are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: marillyn

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best speakers I've owned so far
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best speakers I've owned so far!! I am using these as left and right mains with my sherwood receiver and the definition is impressive. You will definitely need a subwoofer with these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Garza

customer_reviews.title: The sound its really good
customer_reviews.text: Its for my music room, to hear music and tv...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great price. really works well with JBL sub and center channel.
customer_reviews.text: great price. really works well with JBL sub and center channel.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: The sound is super duper sweet
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. The sound is super duper sweet. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More available tunes keep a happy husband.
customer_reviews.text: A welcome addition to the train/model building room. The speakers work well and fit perfectly on the wall shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy- Eastern Shore

customer_reviews.title: Are you a sound buff?
customer_reviews.text: Damn, these speakers totally ROCK! Especially at the low price. I ordered them one day, and sure enough, they were here the next! I was ecstatic....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great will use with my old speakers thank you
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great crisp, clear, sound....extremely low price for the quality you get!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the size
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for the size. But much smaller than I had hoped for. I wish dimensions were included in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice price and product
customer_reviews.text: Nice price and product..Bass is not as deep as I would have liked or it would be a 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: being that I am mainly interested in getting good FM reception
customer_reviews.text: The JBL speakers seem adequate enough, however, being that I am mainly interested in getting good FM reception, location, i.e. where I live...and the distance from the FM station I am trying to pull in can be problematic, despite the quality of(any brand) of speakers. I experience some static and had to purchase an additional "FM Radio signal" booster to get anything that resembled "clear" reception. It's the best I can do I suppose....have already spent enough just to get the one FM Classical radio station that is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great surround speakers !
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 pairs for surround duty ,They are great as a surround speakers.
customer_reviews.author: losservatore

product_meta.title: JBL Arena B15 Black Bookshelf & Surround Speaker with Special Edition Grilles & Logo Set of 2 Black
product_meta.description: Bring games, TV and movies to life with these JBL Arena B15 speakers, which feature HDI (High-Definition Imaging) waveguide technology for high-quality performance. The understated design makes this a sophisticated addition to your home theater system.
feature_bullets: 1-inch (25mm) soft dome tweeter provides clean, powerful highs
5.5-inch (140mm) polycellulose woofer brings room-filling JBL sound to all your music, TV shows, movies, and console gaming
Integrated wall-mount solution for flexible installation and system configuration
Contemporary cabinet shape and all black grilles provide a sophisticated, modern look
Functions as a bookshelf or surround speaker in stereo or multi-channel systems

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars179 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
